explainGlobalSelection.message:
[Global Selection] explains

[Global Selection] is a feature that allows you to modify very lot of data. Defaultly, the checkboxes only influence the current page. If you change to next page with the pager, checkes that you did will be no longer available. However, if you activate the "Global Selection", every data will be checked, regardless of the page. If the "Global Selection" is active, any multiple operations, such as delete, will influence all datas in the database. For example, if you activate the "Global Selection" and click Delete, all datas will be deleted. The pager will be ignored.

To activate the "Global Selection":
    When a checkbox is not checked in the data list, click me will check them in one go. When every checkbox is checked, click me will activate the "Global Selection".

explainexplainGlobalSelection.message: Click me to learn more about [Global Selection].
